name: A Little Light (yuvallll4)
description:
Controls:

WASD - Movement
left control - Crouch
You can drag blue objects with holding the left mouse button.

You play as Jel who had a dream about her favorite place in the world. 

Seems like its time for snooping around...
Your goal is to reach the house on the other side of the block

Game was super inspired by Little Nightmares!
